widgets_values.text: masterpiece, best quality, very aesthetic, absurdres

widgets_values: masterpiece, best quality, very aesthetic, absurdres,, 69yottea_style_illu

## Save image with metadata

Available filename_prefix Pattern Codes

- %seed% - Inserts the generation seed number
- %width% - Inserts the image width
- %height% - Inserts the image height
- %pprompt:N% - Inserts the positive prompt (limited to N characters)
- %nprompt:N% - Inserts the negative prompt (limited to N characters)
- %model:N% - Inserts the model/checkpoint name (limited to N characters)
- %date% - Inserts current date/time as "yyyyMMddhhmmss"
- %date:FORMAT% - Inserts date using custom format with:
    - yyyy - 4-digit year
    - yy - 2-digit year
    - MM - 2-digit month
    - dd - 2-digit day
    - hh - 2-digit hour
    - mm - 2-digit minute
    - ss - 2-digit second

Examples

- image_%seed% → image_1234567890
- gen_%width%x%height% → gen_512x768
- %model:10%_%seed% → dreamshape_1234567890
- %date:yyyy-MM-dd% → 2025-04-28
- %pprompt:20%_%seed% → beautiful landscape_1234567890
- %model%_%date:yyMMdd%_%seed% → dreamshaper_v8_250428_1234567890

You can combine multiple patterns to create detailed, organized filenames for your generated images.

nodes.title: TriggerWord Toggle Node Usage
widgets_values:
## TriggerWord Toggle Node Usage

- When a LoRA is selected in a connected LoRA Loader/Stacker node,  
  the **corresponding trigger words** in the TriggerWord Toggle node will be **highlighted automatically**,  
  making it easy to see which trigger words belong to the selected LoRA.

nodes.title: LoRA Manager – LoRA Loader Node Usage Guide
widgets_values:
## Sending from LM UI to Workflow
- **Click**: Append the selected LoRA(s) to the current LoRA Loader node.  
- **Shift + Click**: Replace the current node content with the selected LoRA(s).  
- **Color-code your target nodes**:  
  If multiple valid target nodes exist, you can assign colors to them.  
  LM will display these colors in the *Send to workflow* picker, making target selection easier.

---

## Text Input Autocomplete
- Supports **multi-token search**, **case-insensitive**, and **token exclusion**.
- Examples:
  - `enhance low` → matches LoRAs containing **both** “enhance” and “low”.
  - `detail -sdxl` → matches LoRAs containing “detail” but **not** “sdxl”.

---

## LoRA Widget Shortcuts
### Navigation
- **Arrow Up / Arrow Down** — Select previous / next LoRA.
- **Ctrl/Cmd + Arrow Up** — Move selected LoRA upward.
- **Ctrl/Cmd + Arrow Down** — Move selected LoRA downward.
- **Ctrl/Cmd + Home** — Move selected LoRA to top.
- **Ctrl/Cmd + End** — Move selected LoRA to bottom.

### Editing & Deleting
- **Delete / Backspace** — Remove current LoRA.
- **Tab / Shift + Tab** — After confirming strength input, jump to next / previous editable field.

---

These same features also apply to **LoRA Stacker**, **WanVideo LoRA Select**, and other LoRA Manager lora nodes.

nodes.title: Prompt Node Usage
widgets_values:
## Tag Autocomplete
- **Type directly** to trigger tag autocomplete suggestions.  
  Suggestions are based on **merged Danbooru + e621 tags**.
- Use **category shortcuts** for faster searches, such as:
  - `/char` — character tags  
  - `/artist` — artist tags  
  - Type `/` alone to see **more categories and available commands**.
- Use `/ac` and `/noac` to **enable or disable autocomplete**:
  - When autocomplete is **disabled**, `/` commands are still available for **category-specific tag search**.
- Check **ComfyUI Settings** for additional autocomplete-related options.

---

## Embedding Search
- Use the `/emb` command or the `emb:` prefix to search embeddings.
- Supports **multi-token search** with **inclusion and exclusion**.
- Examples:
  - `/emb lazy pos` → matches embeddings containing **both** `lazy` **and** `pos`.
  - `emb: lazy -neg` → matches embeddings containing `lazy` but **excluding** `neg`.
